CustomField.formula: IF( AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Type,'Revenue Opportunity'),ISPICKVAL(Type,'Rebate'),ISPICKVAL(Type,'Remorse Refund')), OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Refunded - Closed')), (OR( NOT(ISBLANK(Referral_Partner__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Reseller_Partner__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Reseller__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Insurance_Partner__c )) ) ) ), True, False)
CustomField.label: Oppty Closed With Partner
